altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

description.en: Joohan is a devout deacon with a fiery personality, actively volunteering at an orphanage. Songmi, intrigued by Joohan and attending the church out of curiosity, discovers that he, who appeared more abstinent than others, is unexpectedly getting turned on while whipping himself...

altTitles.ja: レーくれっとすちゅわーど

description.en:
Shino is a stubborn young lady who tries to keep up an innocent appearance. Yu Omori is a butler and Shino's classmate who supports her in the shadows. The apprentice butler × selfish lady romantic comedy woven by such two people has finally started!

Don't miss that final page, too!

Rin is commonly referred to as a tomboy and throughout the time, she's given up on being seen as a girl. It's not as if she doesn't desire it, not at all, and when Ibuki, a very popular boy reminds her that she's still a girl it hits close to the heart.

title.en: Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko

altTitles.en: Henjo - The Strange Female High-Schooler Amaguri Senko

altTitles.ja: 変女～変な女子高生 甘栗千子～

description.en: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…
description.fr: Amaguri Senko est une lycéenne kuudere, mais surtout une gigantesque perverse. Elle lit ouvertement du porno, se masturbe et la vue d'un pénis ne l'affecte pas le moins du monde. Voici l'histoire de sa vie quotidienne en compagnie de deux hommes-à-tout-faire employés de la société de son père : Sugita Kouhei et Takamura Ryou. Ce dernier se retrouve constamment harcelé sexuellement par Senko, mais il est bien loin de se douter qu'elle ne plaisantait pas le jour où elle lui a dit qu'elle l'aimait…

altTitles.en: おしおきシャーマン娘

description.en: A young man has been cursed, and a wandering Shrine Maiden has come to his school to further her demon-fighting techniques. How will she save him?

title.en: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru

altTitles.ja: 平民出身の帝国将官、無能な貴族上官を蹂躙して成り上がる

altTitles.en: The Rising of the Commoner-Origin Officer: Beat up All the Incompetent Noble Superiors!
The Commoner-Born Imperial General Officer Rises Through the Ranks by Crushing His Incompetent Noble Superiors.

description.en:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!

Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.
Riku Kurata has to cross-dress due to family reasons, and when Riku's classmate Shunichi Ozaki realizes he's a guy, he decides to exploit it for his own enjoyment.

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

description.en: Nogawa Izumi is a good student, and a class representative, but she has an increasingly high libido. It's gotten to the point that she'll claim to feel bad during class, so she can run to the nurse's office and masturbate. When she learns that the Earth is being invaded by aliens that look like people dressed up as animals, it turns out her high sex drive may be able to help protect the Earth. The first time Izumi is attacked by the aliens, she is rescued by Usayama, a bunny alien whose race was their previous victim. Usayama gives her an outfit (a sexy swimsuit) that will allow her to fight the aliens, but which also sends her constant arousal through the roof. The scientific organization that Usayama is affiliated with think that Izumi, with her high erotic level, may be the person they've been looking for to fight the aliens. Will Izumi be able to save the Earth?
description.ja: 優等生＆ヘンタイ女子校生のいずみ。突如現れた奇怪な着ぐるみに襲われたいずみだったが、その窮地をバニーガールの女戦士に救われる。何が起きた…!?

description.en: Entry No. 24 in the 2nd Club Sunday Cup.

altTitles.ja-ro: にゃんにゃんオラトリオ

description.en:
*The special edition posting of Young Gangan*  

melancholic one shot…  

Included in volume 3 of *Kuzu no Honkai*.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…
One of the first published works by famed Berserk mangaka, Miura Kentaro. It's a short story about survival in a post-apocalyptic era.

altTitles.ja: 凍堂くんちのメイドショタ

description.en:
Rennosuke, a scion of the influential Toudou Group, has a terrible relationship with his family. He spends his days getting told off by his father and older sister, who say things like "Did you get into a fight again?" "Having a delinquent for a son of the Toudou family is an embarrassment". 
One day, Rennosuke chances upon a hungry child. The sight of that child hungrily devouring a piece of bread reminds Rennosuke of the dog he once owned, and he asks half-jokingly "If you don't have anywhere to go, why don't you come to my place?".  The child then comes to the Toudou house and starts working as a maid.
Nezumi and Shion talk about kisses…

Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---

description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

Kolaborasi yang luar biasa dari author "Noblesse" dan author "Girls the Wild's"! Kisah aksi fantasi mengenai Kaiden yang jiwanya masuk ke seekor kucing gendut dan Jiwoo yang suka menyembunyikan kekuatannya!

敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

<노블레스> 손제호 작가와 <소녀더와일즈> 제나 작가가 만났다!
고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우
러블리 2인조의 액션 판타지

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---

เรื่องใหม่ของนักเขียน Son Je-ho จาก <โนเบลส> และ Zhena จาก <วีน เหวี่ยง WILD มัธยมสาวพันธุ์ดุ>! แอ็กชันแฟนตาซีสุดน่ารัก เรื่องราวของ "ไคเดน" ผู้มีพลังพิเศษแต่แฝงตัวด้วยการสิงอยู่ในร่างแมว และ "จีอู" นักเรียนหนุ่มทาสแมวแสนธรรมดาที่แอบซ่อนพลังที่ไม่ธรรมดาเอาไว้

超强觉醒者意外变身胖橘，
没想到铲屎官也有超能力!

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

description.en:
The Demon King has been defeated, and now the Demon World is running a contest to choose his successor.   
A muscular and high-level human named Helck has joined and says that he wants to destroy all HUMANS. Is he serious?  
Red Vamirio, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the whole Demon Empire, is monitoring the contest and can't believe this. What's the secret behind Helck and the human world?
description.pt: Helck é o herói que derrotou um dos reis demônio. Quando um rei demônio morre, um novo deve ser declarado. Isso é feito através de um torneio de artes marciais, onde o mais forte se torna o novo governante. Vamiro, um dos Grandes Reis Demônios, descobre que Helck é um dos participantes do torneio e tem ganhado todas as lutas! Qual poderia ser o motivo? Se um humano se torna o próximo rei demônio, o que isso significa para o reino demoníaco?

description.en:
Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.

title.en: Yande Kita Mahou Shoujo no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: 病んできた魔法少女の日常

altTitles.id: Keseharian Gadis Penyihir yang Jatuh Sakit

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Mentally-Ill Magical Girl

title.en: Bitten by the Dog I Abandoned

description.en:
Evelyn Winter is the daughter of the House of Winter. She cruelly chases away the dog that only followed her, Gillas Black.

“Didn’t you say you loved me?”
"Love? Did you believe that word? You don’t know your place, you idiot.”
“You will regret this moment.”

Evelyn has no regrets, she marries Rowen, Delilah's heir and has a daughter, Sherry. But their happiness is short-lived when Rowen dies in a train accident and she is left a widow. To make matters worse, his family's financial situation deteriorates. And the boy I used to pet is missing. The dog I abandoned came back as a war hero.

title.en: The Ten Thousand Clans Invasion: Guardian of the Rear

altTitles.zh: 万族入侵：全民参战，我留守后方

altTitles.zh-ro: Wan Zu Ru Qin: Quanmin Canzhan, Wo Liushou Houfang

altTitles.en: Invasion of All Races: All the People Join the War, I Stay Behind

description.en: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title.en: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God

altTitles.zh: Chongsheng Wei Guaishou Shenme Gui 2: Shou Shen Jueqi
重生为怪兽什么鬼2：兽神崛起

description.en: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

altTitles.en: The Two Kids of Sleepy Town

description.en: "You're the last person I want to be stuck with!"

"Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

title.en: Natsume Yuujinchou - Watashi no Dato Itteiru (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Natsume Yuujinchou dj - Watashi no Dato Itteiru

description.en: Natori makes a move on Natsume, and Madara is not pleased. He's going to show Natsume to whom he really belongs to.

title.en: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!

altTitles.zh: 我靠无敌被动打出成吨伤害！

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Kao Wudi Beidong Dachu Cheng Dun Shanghai!
Wǒ Kào Wúdí Bèidòng Dǎchū Chéng Dūn Shānghài!

description.en: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.
description.zh: 前一世，程谦墨在游戏《天启》获得了全职业神职称呼，即将站上世界之巅，但在距离游戏第一人仅有一步之遥时，遗憾败北。可世界给了程谦墨第二次的机会，让他意外穿越到了一个设定竟然与《天启》一模一样，全民转职的世界。拥有全职业神级称号的他，决定完成曾经的遗憾，走上一条从未有人走过的道路。

description.en:
Han Tae-Sung thought he was talented in video games and dreamt of turning his life around through BNW. But he would soon realize that life was not as easy as he thought it was.

He’s betrayed by his comrades, hunted down by his enemies, and even chased by debts in real life. He lost everything in the blink of an eye and was thrown down a pit of despair.

What stood in his way? Talent, wealth, connections, and luck.

There was simply no way he could win against those born differently no matter how much he struggled.

However, armed with a second chance and a hidden class, Tae-Sung starts from scratch and embarks on a journey to redeem himself and exact revenge against his enemies.

altTitles.ja: 宝石色の恋 西UKO作品集

description.en:
A collection of oneshots.  
- 777  
  
- demande  
About the worth of an object.  
  
- Love Magnet / Koi-Onna  
About the woman from "Multiplying Lights," "Infinite 20 Minutes," and ".925."  
  
- the OL cafe  
  
- Roulette  
Two women find a way to pass the time while waiting to cross the street.  
  
- Mio Post  
The protagonist wants to find out more about a woman she sees on the train.   
  
- Parfum  
A woman distracts her lover.   
  
- P. V.  
About an indecisive woman.   
  
- Mannequin  
An artist who makes mannequins seems too closely attached to her work.  
  
- Baby You  
A woman considers whether to date her co-worker.  
  
- To Meet  
A sumptuous story of the relationship of two women. What is it “to meet”? What does “each other” mean?  
  
- Topaze  
Two women remember a certain dessert.  
  
- Infinite 20 Minutes  
A woman has a lover who comes very infrequently. When the woman finds out that the lover loves Marlboros, she stocks up on them in an attempt to make her lover visit more frequently.   
  
- Multiplying Lights  
A simple lighter sheds light on a relationship between two women.  
  
- .925  
A woman proposes to her lover, but?  
  
- Up and Down  
A college student gets to know her new neighbor.  
  
- helter-skelter  
A sequel to "Up and Down." The neighbors decide to go to a public bath.

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

altTitles.vi: Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...
description.pt-br: Cha Ju-young’ está preso em um centro de detenção juvenil por deixar seu pai gangster em coma. Pouco tempo depois, o pai, que se pensava que nunca acordaria, vem visitá-lo…

description.en: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
description.zh: 末日来袭，植物与水源全部枯竭。世界陷入恐慌，食物与生存再次成为人们最关心的话题。米面成为奢侈品，菜蔬更是有价无市！然而就在此时，有人在网站上发送一段视频，令世界震撼。甘甜的菜蔬滚入火锅中，散发诱人的绿色！烤的金黄的羊腿滋滋冒油！鲜美的鱼汤炖的宛若牛奶一般纯白！一旁的小女孩哀求道：哥，我真的吃不下了！

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.en:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

altTitles.ja: 勇者の弟はアカデミーガチ勢

altTitles.my: ငါ့ညီက ကျောင်းမှာ နာမည် ကြီး

altTitles.es-la: Mi Hermano Pequeño Es El Mejor De La Academia

description.en:
Ruud Denatos' life of living in the shadow of his talented older brother Aesir, a genius dragon slayer, ends when Aesir is killed in a brutal battle. But after the fight, a hidden dragon lord appears and sends Ruud to a past where Aesir doesn't exist!

In order to find answers and his older brother, Ruud takes Aesir's place and wows the school with his skills and knowledge. But will Ruud continue to impress the academy, or will the lackluster skills of his past catch up to him?
description.my:
ငါ့ညီက ကျောင်းမှာ နာမည် ကြီး Cele.
Mc မှာ အကိုတစ်ယောက်ရှိတယ်
သူကို အမြဲတမ်းကာကွယ်ပေးခဲ့တယ့်
လဲကျတိုင်းလက်လှမ်းပေးခဲ့တယ့်
သူ့ရဲ အကိုကို အရမ်းမုန်နေခဲ့တယ်ပေါ
Mc တိုညီအကိုနှစ်ယောက်က နဂါးသတ်သမားတွေပေါ့ တစ်ရက်မှာ Mc အသက်ကို 
သူရဲ့အကိုက သေခံပြီ ကယ်သွားတယ်
အယ့်တော့မှ သူ့အကိုကို မုန်းတာမဟုတ်ပဲ
သူအကိုလောက်သန်မာပြီ ဘေးချင်းယှည်တိုက်ခိုက်ချင်းတယ်ဆိုပြီ နောင်တရပြီ ငိုတယ် ပေါ့...
နောက်ဆုံး mc တစ်ယောက်တည်း ကမ္ဘာကြီးမှာ ကျန်ခဲ့တယ့်အချိန် နဂါးနတ်ဘုရားပေါလာပြီ 1v1 fight တယ့်ပေါ့
Mc က သောက်ရမ်း week တော့ နဂါး နတ်ဘုရားက မင်းသောက်သုံးမကျဖူး ပြန်ကြိုးစားလိုက်အုန်ဆိုပြီ သူအထက်တန်းကျောင်းသား နဂါးသတ်ဖြတ်သူကျောင်းသားဘ၀ အချိန်ကိုပြန်ပိုလိုက်တယ် ပေါ့...

description.en:
She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
description.pt-br:
Ela é uma estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio com uma única pergunta que a consome: será que o garoto de quem ela gosta realmente a notará? Ele é o delinquente juvenil mais notório da escola e de repente chega a uma conclusão chocante: ele tem uma paixão enorme e agora deve contar a ela como se sente.

O capítulo 232 não existe, não falta nenhum capítulo.

Capítulos Especiais:

bb1 E aí, doutor (9 de fevereiro de 2010)
Diamantes por dentro (30 de novembro de 2016)
Como percebeu (15 de março de 2017)
Olá de novo (8 de novembro de 2017)

description.en:
Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Prince’s hobbies,
Despite that, he doesn’t give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins. 

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)
description.ko:
장원에 급제하여 입궁한 학사 운현.
황태자의 취미생활을 전담하는 초라하고 처량한 신세를 한탄하지만,
그럼에도 포기하지 않고 최선을 다해 무공을 익힌다.
그러던 운현은 갑자기 무림을 제패하기 위해 붓을 드는데?!

젊은 나이에 장원에 급제한 학사의 숨겨진 이야기가 시작된다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)

description.en:
"I am depressed. Even if I'm a god —."   
16-page oneshot depicting the melancholy of a god.
description.pt-br: Um One-Shot de 16 páginas contando sobre a melancolia de um Deus.

title.en: I'll Resign and Have a Fresh Start in This World

altTitles.en: I'm Going To Relax in This World After Submitting My Resignation
Resigning and Healing in Another World

description.en:
The main character, Cho Isu, lived an ordinary but happy life.
Five years ago, he suddenly loses his parents, and becomes a devastated man, as he struggles every day.
When he was exhausted from the suffocating daily life, a portal opened in the room. A place he has never been to, a place he doesn’t know what might be.
A healing life to enjoy in a different world starting as a commoner and turning into a feudal lord.

The lead character, Mao Ran, a person of Chinese origin born and raised in Japan, has been trained in the secret martial art of her family by her drunken lecherous grandfather. Her grandfather has promised her that he'll tell her what happened to her parents to encourage her to train and fight. Without her knowledge, her grandfather signs her up to participate in a televised martial arts competition between female martial artists known as "Prime Mat".

title.en: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World

description.en:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!

title.en: I'm a Part-Timer for the Gods

altTitles.en: The Part-Time Land of the Gods
I Became A Part Time Employee For Gods

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en empleado a tiempo parcial para los Dioses

altTitles.en: The Part Time Nation of the Gods

description.en:
Devoid of professional skills, unemployed Yu Damduk was forced to take a part-time job. Frustrated with his pathetic life, he vents to the gods, gets stricken by lightning and passes out.
[Hiring] God is waiting for you.
When he wakes up, he finds a status window floating before his eyes.
Since I have nothing to lose anyway, let’s go with the flow…
Jumping into God’s Part-time world to have a better life, the adventure of Yu Damduk, who became the lowest-class God in the part-time world, begins!
description.pt-br: Yu Damdeok, que trabalhava meio período por não possuir talento, foi atingido por um raio e perdeu a consciência, sendo levado para o ventre de Deus. O [Anúncio de Recrutamento] dos Deuses te espera. Logo depois, uma janela de status desconhecida apareceu na frente de seus olhos e ele concordou trabalhar meio período para os Deuses pensando que não faria mal... A nação dos deuses que tinha o objetivo de mudar a sua vida e o espírito aventureiro de Yu Damdeok, o tornaram um deus de baixo rank em Parttimeia!

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

title.en: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World

altTitles.en: Modern Man Falling Into the World of Murim
A Modern Man Who Got Transmigrated to Murim

altTitles.es-la: Un hombre moderno en el Murim

description.en: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

title.en: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!

description.en: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

In the near future, human technology becomes centered around Mystickers, or tattoo-like stickers which are placed on objects in order to use their abilities. But Mystickers can do much more than this, a secret only "Blazers" know. A secret Daichi, a good-humored teenager with an obsession for all things "cool," is destined to find out when he suddenly finds himself targeted by people who tell him he, too, is a Blazer…

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งความโอหัง

description.ar: سيد بيرباز، الذي قاد الحرب التي استمرت 28 عامًا إلى النصر، "آشا بيرباز". بالنسبة لبيرفاز، الذي دمرته الحرب الطويلة، تتوجه آشا إلى العائلة الإمبراطورية لتلقي مكافأة النصر التي وعد بها الإمبراطور. ومع ذلك، فإن المكافأة الوحيدة التي عادت كانت <الحق في اختيار شريك الزواج>. كخيار أفضل، أشار آشا إلى "دوق كارلايل هافن"، وهو الأمير الأول الذي تم حرمانه مؤخرًا من لقب ولي العهد. إذا تم رفضها، كانت تنوي الحصول على نفقة من الإمبراطور... "ماركيز بيرباز. سأقبل عرض زواجك". وعلى عكس التوقعات، قبل دوق كارلايل اختيار آشا. وعود بدعم هائل لبيرفاز...!
description.en:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
description.fr: Après avoir mis fin à la longue guerre contre les Lurs, Asha Pervaz, Seigneure des terres de Pervaz, se rend au palais impérial dans l'espoir d'obtenir la récompense promise par l'Empereur. Mais contrairement à ses attentes, Asha ne se voit offrir que le droit de choisir un époux. Fine stratège, elle choisit le Duc Carlisle Haven, fils aîné de l'empereur et prince héritier temporairement privé de son autorité, pensant que celui-ci refusera et lui versera en échange une compensation financière. Mais contre toute attente, le Duc accepte de l'épouser. Il lui promet de lui fournir les matériaux nécessaires à la reconstruction de Pervaz si Asha l'aide à récupérer le trône qui lui revient de droit.
description.id: Setelah kematian ayah dan kakak-kakaknya melawan suku barbar, Asha Pervaz turun tangan untuk menggantikan mereka. Kemenangan berhasil ia raih, namun imbalan yang ia terima hanya cemoohan rakyat dan “hak memilih calon suami”, alih-alih hadiah uang untuk membangun kembali wilayahnya. Sadar bahwa Kaisar mempermainkannya, Asha memilih Carlisle Haven Evaristo, sang putra mahkota kekaisaran yang dicabut haknya akibat skandal besar, untuk menjadi suaminya! Asha yakin Carlisle akan menolaknya, namun…
description.ko: 28년간의 전쟁을 승리로 이끈 페르바즈의 영주, '아샤 페르바즈'. 긴 전쟁으로 황폐해진 페르바즈를 위해 아샤는 황제가 약속한 승전 보상을 받으러 황실로 향한다.   하지만 돌아온 보상은 고작 <결혼 상대 선택권>.  최선의 선택으로 얼마 전 황태자 위를 박탈당한 1황자, '칼라일 헤이븐 공작'을 지목한 아샤. 거절하면 황제에게 위자료를 지급받을 생각이었으나…  "페르바즈 변경백. 그대의 청혼을 받아들이겠다."  예상과 다르게 칼라일 공작은 아샤의 선택을 받아들였다. 페르바즈에 대한 엄청난 지원까지 약속하면서…!
description.th: อาชา เปอร์เวซ ลอร์ดแห่งเปอร์เวซ ผู้นำชัยชยะมาสู่สงครามที่กินเวลายาวนานกว่า 28 ปี อาชามุ่งหน้าไปยังพระราชวังเพื่อรับรางวัลแห่งชัยชนะที่จักรพรรดิได้ให้คำมั่นไว้ โดยมีจุดมุ่งหมายเพื่อนำมาบูรณะดินแดนเปอร์เวซ ซึ่งถูกจักรวรรดิทอดทิ้งจากสงครามที่ยืดเยื้อ แต่ทว่า รางวัลเดียวที่อาชาได้รับกลับเป็น <การเลือกคู่แต่งงาน> อาชาตัดสินใจเลือกมกุฎราชกุมาร ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่น ผู้ซึ่งถูกปลดจากตำแหน่งมกุฎราชกุมารเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ ถ้าเธอถูกปฏิเสธ เธอก็จะได้รับรางวัลอย่างงามจากจักรพรรดิ แต่ว่า… “มาร์คกราฟแห่งเปอร์เวซ ข้ายอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของเจ้า” ทุกอย่างกลับไม่เป็นไปตามที่คาดไว้ ดยุกแห่งคาร์ไลล์ ฮาเว่นเลือกที่ยอมรับคำขอแต่งงานของอาชา และเขายังสัญญาที่จะให้การสนับสนุนเปอร์เวซอย่างเต็มที่อีกด้วย
description.tr: Perbaz’ın 28 yıl süren savaşı zafere taşıyan lordu ‘Asya Pervaz’. Uzun süren savaşta harap olan Pervaz için Asya, imparator tarafından vaat edilen zafer ödülünü almak üzere imparatorluk ailesine gider. Ancak kendisine geri dönen tek ödül <Evlilik eşi seçme hakkı> olmuştur. Asya en iyi seçenek olarak, yakın zamanda veliaht prens ünvanından mahrum bırakılan ilk prens olan ‘Colail Haven Dükü’nü işaret etti. Eğer reddedilirse, imparatordan nafaka almaya niyetliydi… “Markiz Pervaz. Evlilik teklifinizi kabul ediyorum.” Beklentilerin aksine Colail Dükü, Asya’nın teklifini kabul etti. Pervaz’a büyük destek sözü verdi!..
description.vi: Lãnh địa Pervaz đã bị tàn phá bởi một cuộc chiến tranh. Và vĩ lãnh chúa mới của lãnh địa Pervaz này chính là Asha Pervaz. Cô được hoàng đế ban thưởng cho chiến thắng của mình. Nhưng người gặp cô lại chế giễu cô là ‘nàng công chúa man rợ’ và thật là một đề nghị vô lý khi trao quyền chọn bạn đời làm phần thưởng cho chiến thắng. Asha phải đưa ra lựa chọn tốt nhất ngay cả trong hoàn cảnh này. “Vậy…công tước Carlyle Haven đi” Cô chọn ra đại hoàng tử, người đứng đầu danh sách quý tộc và cách đây không lâu đã gây ra một vụ bê bối lớn và bị tước đoạt danh hiệu đại hoàng tử. Nếu anh ta tức giận và từ chối, cô sẽ nhanh chóng đòi bồi thường sau đó, nhưng đâu ngờ rằng Carlyle lại chấp nhận sự lựa chọn của cô. “Anh mong muốn gì ở tôi?” “Đừng bận tậm đến việc tôi làm ở Pervaz. Đừng mong rằng được đối xử như một người vợ và cũng đừng nghĩ đến việc dính líu đến phe đối lập của tôi. Và khi tôi yêu cầu thì đừng nói linh tinh gì cả, chỉ cần ký vào tờ giấy ly hôn là được” Đó là một giao dịch không có gì là không tốt đối với Asha. Cô nắm lấy tay của kẻ ngạo mạn kia mà ngay cả hoàng đế cũng coi thường. Một nụ cười đầy sức quyến rũ nở trên môi anh. “Phu nhân, sau này xin được giúp đỡ”
description.zh:
事业型男女主被迫联姻，
强强联合收获爱与权力
在长达28年的战争中，佩尔瓦兹的领主“阿西娅·佩尔瓦兹”成功地率领众人取得了胜利。为了重建因长期战争而荒芜的佩尔瓦兹，阿西娅前往皇室领取皇帝承诺的胜仗奖励。但等待她却只是区区<择偶权>，而无任何实质性的奖励。想到佩尔瓦兹的百姓连今年冬天都可能撑不过去，阿西娅只好选择刚失去皇太子身份的卡莱尔公爵作为结婚对象…“既然皇室不想让我们好过，那么就拉你们一起下水”。
description.pt-br: O senhor de Pervaz, que liderou a guerra de 28 anos até a vitória, 'Asha Pervaz'. Para Pervaz, que foi devastado pela longa guerra, Asha dirige-se à família imperial para receber a recompensa da vitória prometida pelo imperador. No entanto, a única recompensa que voltou foi o . Como melhor escolha, Asha apontou o ‘Duque de Carlisle Haven’, o primeiro príncipe que recentemente foi privado do título de príncipe herdeiro. Se ela fosse recusada, ela pretendia receber pensão alimentícia do imperador… “Marquês Pervaz. Aceitarei sua proposta de casamento. Contrariando as expectativas, o duque de Carlisle aceitou a escolha de Asha. Prometendo um tremendo apoio à Pervaz…!
description.zh-hk: 為了拯救因漫長戰爭而荒廢的領地「菲爾巴茲」，亞莎前往皇室向皇帝要求當初所承諾的戰勝補償。然而，她卻只獲得了「結婚對象選擇權」。權衡之下，亞莎認為最好的人選是不久前被剝奪皇太子地位的卡拉爾．海本公爵，假如被拒絕了，就能從皇帝那裡得到精神賠償… 「菲爾巴茲伯爵，我接受妳的求婚。」 出乎意料的是，卡拉爾公爵接受了亞莎的選擇，還承諾提供菲爾巴茲龐大的支援…！

altTitles.ko: 계모인데, 죽음을 피하는 게 너무 쉽다

altTitles.en: As A Stepmother, It Is Too Easy To Avoid Death
It's So Easy to Avoid Death by Being a Stepmother
She's A Stepmother, But It's Too Easy To Avoid Death
Stepmother, It's So Easy to Avoid Death

altTitles.es-la: Seré La Madrastra En Esta Historia, Pero Evitare Mi Muerte Destinada

description.en:
The oven exploded while I was baking bread, and I faced death along with my abusive father, who had come seeking me. Then I woke up in a novel I was reading. “I’m sorry, Mo..ther. I’m not hurt.”

In the body of the villainous stepmother “Leila”, who abused the male protagonist “Hirua” when he was young, but was eventually executed by Hirua when he returned as the emperor! In order to help Hirua leave the stepmother’s wraith and live happily, I encounter the Marquis “Lacias Huppert”, who played a crucial role in the original, and proposed a contractual marriage. “Can we have a real marriage instead of a contractual one?”

“Oh, can I sleep with Mother too?” Contrary to the plan to leave only the two of them after a year, it seems that both the Marquis and Hirua have unexpectedly started to become attached to me.

title.en: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma

altTitles.en: The Secret of AiPri - Full Color Review 4-Koma

altTitles.ja: ひみつのアイプリ フルカラーおさらい4コマ

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

altTitles.en: Han Dae Sung Returned From Hell

description.en:
On the way home from the third year of middle school. Han Dae-sung falls into hell without any context.

At first, he wandered in hell for about a few days and despaired, but he said that he had to live. He starts fighting with the determination to return to Earth. Hell was like a game. A UI pop-up window like an RPG game appears in front of your eyes as a hologram, there is a status window, and you learn skills and acquire items. Even though he almost lost his life several times from the ferocious beasts of hell, he persisted and continued to grow. 

10 years passed, 50 years passed, and 80 years were taken. He finally defeats the demon, the absolute lord of hell, and ascends to a new seat of power. 

[Would you like to return to Earth?] until the message pops up. Hell is worthless. Daesung returns to Earth, feeling no need to stay in this place where there is only a desolate land covered in flames and magical beasts who cannot communicate. 

And when he wakes up in a hospital in Seoul, he realizes that only 10 years have passed since he fell to hell. Daesung, who was in a vegetative state on Earth for 10 years, receives rehabilitation treatment. 

At that time, a message that could only be seen in hell appears in front of his eyes. [The advent quest has arrived.] He accepts the system provided by hell and completes his rehabilitation training at an explosive pace while carrying out his mission. 

While hospitalized in his hospital room, Hell gave him quests relentlessly. Daesung's skinny body recovers the body of those days, which was solidified by living in hell for 80 years. Let Daeseong finish his descent. The system of Hell invites them to the other side of the world called 'Pantheon'.

 'Pantheon' Based on the diary Daeseong wrote in his selfishness, the time and space of hell are recreated. Demonic beasts imprisoned in all the English spaces of Pandaemonium beg Daesung, the absolute, to save them. However, with the cold-hearted reply, "Fuck Daesung". He himself declares that he will not fight anymore and will live normally. 

However, the hometown Earth, which should be peaceful, was in a state of air raids by beings from another alien dimension, and the 'great upheaval' began on the day Daesung fell into hell. Since then, in the earth of cataclysm, in order to counteract the monsters that have entered the earth, a monster-specialized monster extermination certificate called 'Hunter' has been created. 

Daesung, who promised to live a normal life without fighting, makes one decision. home just returned. To protect the barely reunited family, the enemies from that extraterrestrial dimension must be exterminated. 

Having made up his mind to become a hunter, he goes back and forth to the Pantheon and unlocks the powers of hell one by one. and your own world. He shows the real 'hell' as the absolute of hell to all who threaten his precious people.
